import React from 'react' import { Icon } from '@iconify/react'; const br = async (currentFormattedData) => { if (!currentFormattedData) { console.error('currentFormattedData is undefined'); return null; } const lat = currentFormattedData.lat; const lon = currentFormattedData.lon; const currentDate = new Date().toISOString(); try { const brightSkyResponse = await fetch(`https://api.brightsky.dev/weather?lat=${lat}&lon=${lon}&date=${currentDate}`); const brightSkyData = await brightSkyResponse.json(); console.log('Bright Sky API Response:', brightSkyData.weather); return brightSkyData.weather; } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching weather data:', error.message); return null; // Handle the error gracefully } } function Details({h, currentFormattedData}) { const [weatherDetails, setWeatherDetails] = useState(null); return (

{h}

{weatherData.name}

22°

4:30 PM

) } export default Details
